title: Failed to check for a update on spigot. 问题 怎么解决
author: ling_xiao_
txt_content:

replies.author: もぺもぺ
replies.txt_content: scriptblockplus 插件的配置文件中设置 UpdateChecker: false

replies.author: EmptyLava
replies.txt_content:
scriptblockplus插件用主线程检测更新超时，然后服务器无响应，报spigot watchdog

在这个插件的配置文件内找到关于检测更新的选项，关闭即可
